mapper.sql: id, title, info, tag_id, praise, `collect`, `browse`, `status`, picture_type, pix_user_id, create_time
select ppc.id, ppc.title, ppc.info, ppc.tag_id, ppc.praise, ppc.`collect`, ppc.`browse`, ppc.`status`, ppc.picture_type, ppc.pix_user_id, ppc.create_time from spring_cloud.pix_picture_collection ppc
mapper.select:
select
from spring_cloud.pix_picture_collection
title like concat('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
left join spring_cloud.pix_user_collect puc on ppc.id = puc.picture_collection_id group by ppc.id order by ppc.id desc limit 20
left join spring_cloud.pix_user_praise pup on ppc.id = pup.picture_collection_id group by ppc.id order by ppc.id desc limit 20
mapper.insert:
select last_insert_id()
insert into spring_cloud.pix_picture_collection (id, title, info, tag_id, praise, `collect`, `browse`, `status`, picture_type, pix_user_id, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tagId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{praise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictureType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pixUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update spring_cloud.pix_picture_collection
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag_id = #{tagId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
praise = #{praise,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`collect` = #{collect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`browse` = #{browse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
picture_type = #{pictureType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pix_user_id = #{pixUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into spring_cloud.pix_picture_collection (id, title, info, tag_id, praise, `collect`, `browse`, `status`, picture_type, pix_user_id, create_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.praise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.collect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.browse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pictureType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pixUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: left join pix_user pu on pu.id = ppc.pix_user_id where pu.id = #{pixUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
